Open Source Attribution
=======================

+----------------------+-----------+------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Name                 | Version   | License                                                          | URL                                                                       | Description                                                                                                               |
+----------------------+-----------+------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| numpy                | 1.20.1    | BSD License                                                      | https://www.numpy.org                                                     | NumPy is the fundamental package for array computing with Python.                                                         |
+----------------------+-----------+------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| openfermion          | 0.11.0    | Apache 2                                                         | http://www.openfermion.org                                                | The electronic structure package for quantum computers.                                                                   |
+----------------------+-----------+------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| openqemist           | 0.2.1     | Apache Software License                                          | https://github.com/1QB-Information-Technologies/openqemist                | Quantum chemistry simulation library.                                                                                     |
+----------------------+-----------+------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| pandas               | 1.2.3     | BSD                                                              | https://pandas.pydata.org                                                 | Powerful data structures for data analysis, time series, and statistics                                                   |
+----------------------+-----------+------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| py3Dmol              | 0.8.0     | MIT License                                                      | https://3dmol.csb.pitt.edu                                                | An IPython interface for embedding 3Dmol.js views                                                                         |
+----------------------+-----------+------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| pyscf                | 1.7.6     | Apache Software License                                          | http://www.pyscf.org                                                      | PySCF: Python-based Simulations of Chemistry Framework                                                                    |
+----------------------+-----------+------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| pytket               | 0.10.1    | Other/Proprietary License                                        | https://cqcl.github.io/pytket                                             | Python module for interfacing with the CQC tket library of quantum software                                               |
+----------------------+-----------+------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| pytket-qiskit        | 0.10.0    | Other/Proprietary License                                        | https://github.com/CQCL/pytket-extensions                                 | Extension for pytket, providing translation to and from the Qiskit framework                                              |
+----------------------+-----------+------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| pytket-qulacs        | 0.7.0     | Other/Proprietary License                                        | https://github.com/CQCL/pytket-extensions                                 | Extension for pytket, providing access to the Qulacs Simulator                                                            |
+----------------------+-----------+------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| scipy                | 1.6.1     | BSD License                                                      | https://www.scipy.org                                                     | SciPy: Scientific Library for Python                                                                                      |
+----------------------+-----------+------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| sympy                | 1.7.1     | BSD License                                                      | https://sympy.org                                                         | Computer algebra system (CAS) in Python                                                                                   |
+----------------------+-----------+------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
